definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: All films show the polycrystalline anatase TiO2 structure.
sentences.chinese: 薄膜均爲多晶銳鈦礦結構。

sentences.english: The silver halide fibers were made by means of hot extrusion.
sentences.chinese: 採用熱擠壓法成型製備出鹵化銀多晶光纖。

sentences.english: In this thesis, by utilizing excimer laser annealing (ELA) crystallization, the study ofp-Si has been deployed mainly.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要展開了應用準分子激光晶化多晶硅的研究。

sentences.english: Granular polysilicon is a very useful form factor.
sentences.chinese: 粒狀多晶硅是一個非常有用的生產因素。

sentences.english: Sony already has low-temperature polysilicon TFT capability.
sentences.chinese: 索尼已經有生成低溫多晶硅TFT液晶的能力。

sentences.english: Ammonium nitrate (AN) is a kind of polymorphous substance which is subjected to caking due to environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 硝酸銨是一種多晶型的物質，受外界因素影響易結塊。

sentences.english: In polycrystalline samples, the intermediate-frequency mechanism is interpreted as the grain-boundary conduction mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 而礦物多晶中間頻率段的導電機制由顆粒邊界所引起。

sentences.english: An individual crystal in a polycrystalline metal or ceramic.
sentences.chinese: 金屬或陶瓷多晶體中的一個單獨的小晶體。

sentences.english: Photoetching polysilicon forms force sensitive resistance bar.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅經光刻後便形成力敏電阻條。

sentences.english: The effect of fine particles on the flow behavior of polycrystalline ice under stress has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了應力下微粒對多晶冰流變行爲的影響。

sentences.english: One should try to avoid running metal over poly gate. As this cause to increase in parasitic capacitance.
sentences.chinese: 避免金屬在多晶硅柵上走線，會增加寄生電容。

sentences.english: The device utilizes three-phase construction, with the technology of buried-channel and four-layer polysilicon.
sentences.chinese: 該器件採用三相結構，埋溝和四層多晶硅技術。

sentences.english: The aggregation is a count of members.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅是細小硅晶的集合體。

sentences.english: At high temperature it yet keep polycrystalline structure.
sentences.chinese: 高溫下始終保持多晶體微晶粒結構。

sentences.english: Poly-crystal MgF 2 by hot-press is used material of dome.
sentences.chinese: 熱壓多晶氟化鎂常用作整流罩材料。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, the domain averaging inclusion method is applied to sliding polycrystals.
sentences.chinese: 第三章進一步將均值等效夾雜法應用於多晶滑錯體。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
